mapper.select: select r1.* from role_resource rr left join resource_info r1 on rr.resource_id = r1.id left join role_info r2 on rr.role_sign = r2.sign left join user_role ur on r2.sign = ur.role_sign where ur.username = #{username} order by r1.parent, r1.sort
mapper.insert: insert into resource_info (name, path, icon, component, parent, title, sort, hide_in_bread, hide_in_menu, status, created_time, created_by, updated_time, updated_by) values (#{name}, #{path}, #{icon}, #{component}, #{parent}, #{title}, #{sort}, #{hideInBread}, #{hideInMenu}, #{status}, now(), #{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy})
